entries.name: Properties
entries: Forging Conditions: Must be forged in a place of great destruction or by someone who has witnessed apocalypse.
Armor Effects: You have resistance to force damage and immunity to being {@condition frightened}.
Weapon Effects: This weapon deals an additional {@dice 2d6} force damage, but you take {@dice 1d4} force damage each time you attack.
Additional Effects: You can cast Disintegrate once per week without using a spell slot.
